description: Provide janitorial services for various buildings located at 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick.
tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Janitorial Services for Department of National Defence
#### Contract Number: W6898-240679

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the provision of comprehensive janitorial services for the various buildings located at 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick.

**Key Information**

* **Contract Type**: Service Contract
* **Duration**: July 1, 2024 to June 30, 2025, with an optional two-year extension
* **Location**: 5 CDSB Gagetown, New Brunswick

**Requirements**

The contractor is required to furnish all necessary cleaning materials, labour, tools, equipment, supervision, travel, and profit for the provision of complete janitorial services. Work must be completed in accordance with Specification Number L-G2-9900/1919, which forms part of the bid document.

**Site Visit**

A site visit has been scheduled for April 11, 2024. Offerors are strongly encouraged to attend, but this is not mandatory. To confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of their representatives, Offerors must communicate with the Contracting Authority by 12:00 pm on April 10, 2024. The Contracting Authority will assign a specific time slot.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The selection criterion for this contract is **Lowest Price**.

**Security Requirements**

This document contains security requirements. Interested Offerors must ensure they meet the relevant security clearances prior to submission.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact Kristelle LeBlanc, LeBlanc.Kristelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Submission Details**

To submit an offer, please visit the online platform: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19246174?extsite=MTkyNDYxNzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that this contract falls under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia
